page.title: 13 FARMING
page.content: Not far from Harley is a Garden Centre, associated with a fruit farm. Gooseberries and raspberries are the main fruit crops and plants af all descriptions are available. Near to this is a U.K.F.fertilizer centre. The only combine harvesters are found at Harnage Grange showing the intense concentration upon arable farming at the Grange. Tractors are used at all farms in the area. At Lower Springs Nursery a large number of saplings are flourishing. Obvious to the first time visitor farming is the dominant feature of the area. Homesteads are scattered and a large percentage of the land is used for both arable and animal farming with Harnage Grange farming over a large area of the grid and other farms concentrating more on the animal side of land use.
